languages.text: "Вместо фальшивого побега ты мог бы организовать настоящий. У тебя есть ресурсы и солдаты — используй их. Император направит тебя".

traits.locale_text: "Вместо фальшивого побега ты мог бы организовать настоящий. У тебя есть ресурсы и солдаты — используй их. Император направит тебя".

languages.text: "Instead of staging a fake escape, you could stage a real one. You have the resources, you have the people — so use them. The Emperor will guide you."
languages.original_text: "Вместо фальшивого побега ты мог бы организовать настоящий. У тебя есть ресурсы и солдаты — используй их. Император направит тебя".

traits.locale_text: "Instead of staging a fake escape, you could stage a real one. You have the resources, you have the people — so use them. The Emperor will guide you."
"Instead of staging a fake escape, you could stage a real one. You have the resources, you have the people — so use them. The Emperor will guide you."
"Instead of staging a fake escape, you could stage a real one. You have the resources, you have the people — so use them. The Emperor will guide you."
"Instead of staging a fake escape, you could stage a real one. You have the resources, you have the people — so use them. The Emperor will guide you."
"Instead of staging a fake escape, you could stage a real one. You have the resources, you have the people — so use them. The Emperor will guide you."

languages.text: “与其上演一出假装逃跑的闹剧，不如假戏真做。既然你手里有资源，也有支持你的人们，那就把这一切利用起来。帝皇会指引你的。”
languages.original_text: "Instead of staging a fake escape, you could stage a real one. You have the resources, you have the people — so use them. The Emperor will guide you."

traits.locale_text: “与其上演一出假装逃跑的闹剧，不如假戏真做。既然你手里有资源，也有支持你的人们，那就把这一切利用起来。帝皇会指引你的。”

languages.text: 「偽の逃亡を演出するのではなく、本当に脱走すればいい。お前には十分な資源や人材があるから、おおいに使えばいい。皇帝がきっと導いてくれるだろう」
languages.original_text: "Instead of staging a fake escape, you could stage a real one. You have the resources, you have the people — so use them. The Emperor will guide you."

traits.locale_text: 「偽の逃亡を演出するのではなく、本当に脱走すればいい。お前には十分な資源や人材があるから、おおいに使えばいい。皇帝がきっと導いてくれるだろう」

languages.text: «En lugar de preparar una fuga falsa, podría idea una real. Tiene los recursos, tiene el personal... úselos. El Emperador le guiará».
languages.original_text: "Instead of staging a fake escape, you could stage a real one. You have the resources, you have the people — so use them. The Emperor will guide you."

traits.locale_text: «En lugar de preparar una fuga falsa, podría idea una real. Tiene los recursos, tiene el personal... úselos. El Emperador le guiará».

languages.text: « Au lieu de faire semblant de vous évader, vous devriez tenter le coup pour de bon. Vous avez les ressources et les hommes nécessaires. L'Empereur vous guidera. »
languages.original_text: "Instead of staging a fake escape, you could stage a real one. You have the resources, you have the people — so use them. The Emperor will guide you."

traits.locale_text: « Au lieu de faire semblant de vous évader, vous devriez tenter le coup pour de bon. Vous avez les ressources et les hommes nécessaires. L'Empereur vous guidera. »

languages.text: "Statt eine falsche Flucht zu inszenieren, solltet Ihr es mit einer echten versuchen. Ihr habt die Ressourcen, Ihr habt die Leute – setzt sie ein. Der Imperator wird Euch leiten."
languages.original_text: "Instead of staging a fake escape, you could stage a real one. You have the resources, you have the people — so use them. The Emperor will guide you."

traits.locale_text: "Statt eine falsche Flucht zu inszenieren, solltet Ihr es mit einer echten versuchen. Ihr habt die Ressourcen, Ihr habt die Leute – setzt sie ein. Der Imperator wird Euch leiten."

languages.text: "Böyle bir tezgâh kurmak yerine gerçekten kaçış planı yapabilirdin. Elinde hem kaynak hem insan vara. Kullansana onları. İmparator yolunu aydınlatır."
languages.original_text: "Instead of staging a fake escape, you could stage a real one. You have the resources, you have the people — so use them. The Emperor will guide you."

traits.locale_text: "Sahte bir kaçış tezgâhı kurmak yerine gerçek bir tane düzenleyebilirdin. Elinde kaynak da var insan da. Kullan onları. İmparator yolunu aydınlatır."
